code: import React,{useEffect}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{useDispatch,useSelector}from'react-redux';import Message from'../components/Message';import Loader from'../components/Loader';import{listTasks,deleteTask}from'../actions/taskActions';import TaskItem from'../components/TaskItem';import AddTaskForm from'../components/AddTaskForm';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const HomeScreen=()=>{const dispatch=useDispatch();const navigate=useNavigate();const userLogin=useSelector(state=>state.userLogin);const{userInfo}=userLogin;const taskList=useSelector(state=>state.taskList);const{loading,error,tasks}=taskList;const taskDelete=useSelector(state=>state.taskDelete);const{success:successDelete}=taskDelete;const taskCreate=useSelector(state=>state.taskCreate);const{success:successCreate}=taskCreate;useEffect(()=>{if(!userInfo){navigate('/login');}else{dispatch(listTasks());}},[dispatch,navigate,userInfo,successDelete,successCreate]);const deleteHandler=id=>{if(window.confirm('Are you sure you want to delete this task?')){dispatch(deleteTask(id));}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"home-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"My Tasks"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AddTaskForm,{}),loading?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Loader,{}):error?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Message,{variant:"danger",children:error}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"task-list",children:tasks.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Message,{children:"No tasks found. Add a task to get started!"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"task-categories",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"task-category",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"To Do"}),tasks.filter(task=>task.status==='todo').map(task=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TaskItem,{task:task,onDelete:()=>deleteHandler(task._id)},task._id))]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"task-category",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"In Progress"}),tasks.filter(task=>task.status==='in-progress').map(task=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TaskItem,{task:task,onDelete:()=>deleteHandler(task._id)},task._id))]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"task-category",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Completed"}),tasks.filter(task=>task.status==='completed').map(task=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TaskItem,{task:task,onDelete:()=>deleteHandler(task._id)},task._id))]})]})})})]});};export default HomeScreen;
